form.IN:
Kadar je beseda prislov, je njen primernik
better
, presežnik pa
best
: glej posamezni gesli.

sense.def:
‘Well’
rečemo, kadar nameravamo povedati nekaj drugega, zlasti ko omahujemo ali poskušamo omiliti svojo trditev ali pa nameravamo popraviti neko trditev.

seg.quote: ‘Is that right?’—‘Well, I think so.’
I suppose you want to know if I've changed my mind. Well, I haven't.
Well, thank you Jim for talking to us about your work.
Well, thank God for that.
It took me years, well months at least, to realise that he'd actually lied to me.

sense.def:
Kdor nekaj naredi
well
, tisto naredi kakovostno.

seg.quote: She speaks French well.
He handled it well.

sense.def:
Well
pomeni tudi temeljito ali v zelo veliki meri.

seg.quote: You say you don't know this man very well?
They were on the brink of war, but they were well prepared.

T.def: Besedo uporabljamo v vprašanjih in izjavah o stopnji.

seg.quote: I don't know how well Dennis knew him.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
well
dodatno poudarimo nekatere prislove in redke pridevnike.

seg.quote: They stood well back from the heat.
Actors are well aware of this problem.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
may well happen
, se bo verjetno zgodilo.

seg.quote: Your eyesight may well improve.

sense.def:
To be well
pomeni biti zdrav.

seg.quote: They told me you weren't well.

sense.def:
A well
je jama v tleh, iz katere črpamo zaloge vode.

An oil well
lahko imenujemo tudi samo
a well
.

Kadar stvari
are going well
ali kadar
all is well
, so okoliščine zadovoljive.

seg.quote: Things went well for John until the First World War.

sense.def:
To be well out of a situation
pomeni, da je dobro, da nekdo ni več vpleten v določene okoliščine.

Kadar rečemo, da tisto, kar se je zgodilo,
is just as well
, hočemo povedati, da je sreča, da se je zgodilo.

seg.quote: He didn't have to speak very often, which was just as well as he was a man who liked to keep words to himself.

sense.def:
Kadar je ena stvar vpletena
as well as another
, je prva stvar vpletena poleg druge.

seg.quote: Women, as well as men, have a fundamental right to work.

sense.def:
Kadar je vpletena ena stvar, druga stvar pa je vpletena
as well
, je vpletena tudi druga stvar.

seg.quote: He needs to develop his reading further, and his writing as well.

sense.def:
Kadar rečemo
I may as well do something
ali
I might as well do something
, hočemo povedati, da bomo nekaj storili, čeprav nam ni povsem prav.

seg.quote: I may as well admit that I knew the answer all along.
So the Space Age had now well and truly begun.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
oh well
povemo, da sprejemamo dejstvo, da okoliščin ni mogoče spremeniti, čeprav zaradi tega nismo zadovoljni.

seg.quote: Oh well, you wouldn't understand.

sense.def:
Kadar solze
well up in one's eyes
, pritečejo na površino.
